name: Multi-game Character Editor
description:
MCE is an editor for saved games, characters and highscores from the following 50 games:
  • Bard's Tale 1
  • Bard's Tale 2
  • Bard's Tale 3
  • Bard's Tale Construction Set
  • BattleTech
  • Bloodwych
  • Chambers of Shaolin
  • Champions of Krynn
  • Citadel of Vras
  • Dark Castle
  • Deja Vu 1 & 2
  • Demon's Winter
  • Dragon Wars
  • Druid 2
  • Eye of the Beholder 1 & 2
  • Faery Tale Adventure
  • Grand Monster Slam
  • Great Giana Sisters
  • Hard 'n' Heavy
  • Heroes of the Lance
  • Hillsfar
  • Impossible Mission 2
  • Keef the Thief
  • Legend of Faerghail
  • Legend of Lothian
  • Might & Magic 2
  • Neuromancer
  • Nitro
  • Phantasie 1 & 3
  • Pirates!
  • Pool of Radiance
  • Questron 2
  • Return of the Jedi
  • Rogue
  • Shadowgate
  • Shadowlands
  • Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon
  • Temple of Apshai
  • Times of Lore
  • Transylvania 1 & 2
  • Ultima 3
  • Ultima 4
  • Ultima 5
  • Ultima 6
  • Winter Games
  • Wizardry 6
  • World Games
  • Zerg
